author: vkhristenko
body:
This PR is done on top of 13813/13805, however those should be merged first!
The primary purpose of this PR is for _online DQM._

1) Phase 1 module - QIE10Task
2) Some small additions to reduce the number of false alarms.

as I've already said this PR is separate from 138*\* and will be used in Online, and not urgent to have in Offline!

VK
title: Updates for HCAL DQM after the ROC Review
